name: Persistence & Statistics
goal: Save progress and track player statistics

prds.description: localStorage schema for statistics (games played, won, streaks, distribution)
steps: Open browser DevTools > Application > Local Storage
Verify contains: gamesPlayed, gamesWon, currentStreak, bestStreak, distribution
prds.automatedTest: P6.1 - Statistics object has required properties

steps: Verify statistics are loaded from localStorage
Verify games played count is preserved

prds.description: Today's game state persistence (prevent daily challenge replay)
steps: Verify game state is restored (same guesses shown)
Verify cannot make additional guesses if game was completed

prds.description: Guess distribution histogram display in win/loss modals
steps: Verify bars represent games won in 1-6 guesses
Verify current game's guess count is highlighted

prds.description: Score summary in modals (guesses used, best score, current streak)
steps: Verify modal shows best ever score
prds.manualTest: Modal stat values populated in showEndModal

steps: Verify win percentage is calculated correctly
